message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it holds significant value, and I'm confident it will be worth your investment. I'm initially proposing a price of $15,000. What are your thoughts?

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10,000? I believe this would be a fair compromise.
Bob, I understand your budget considerations.  While the product is worth a premium, I'm willing to come down a bit to meet you halfway. How about $12,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Given my budget constraints, I am proposing a price of $11,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
